title: Madmast Barkhaa (2015)
overview: Barkhaa is married to Ranbir, a soldier who has to leave and Barkhaa finds herself alone. Due to her lonely, passionless married life, she begins an affair with her husband's friend, Akaash. However, Ranbir's sister, Neetu, comes to learn of their affair.
storyline: Barkhaa is married to Ranbir, a soldier who has to leave and Barkhaa finds herself alone. Due to her lonely, passionless married life, she begins an affair with her husband's friend, Akaash. However, Ranbir's sister, Neetu, comes to learn of their affair.
plot: The story revolves around Leena kapoor (Barkhaa) who is married to an army man named Ranbir, who has to leave urgently leaving barkhaa all alone. Due to her lonely, passionless married life, she begins an affair with her husband's friend named Akaash, Twist in the story comes when barkhaa's sister in law Neetu comes to know about Barkha's affair with Akaash in the absence of her brother Ranbir.
